ext_des.message: Secure Browser Lock is a powerful extension designed to protect your browser from unauthorized access. With password protection and a convenient one-click lock feature, you can safeguard all open tabs and windows when stepping away from your device. Whether you're working in a shared environment or just want extra peace of mind, this tool ensures your browsing activity remains private and secure at all times.

ext_title.message: Click to lock your browser and secure all open windows.

notif_not_match_passwd.message: Passwords do not match. Please try again.

notif_last_wrong_passwd.message: The current password entered is incorrect.

notif_first.message:
Important:
1. This extension will only function after a password is set.
2. To avoid potential conflicts, ensure no similar extensions are installed before setting your password.
